Text:
um. cool.

Of all the 6 seasons of highlander, we now have 1 episode in 720p (sort of).

thanks i think.

This is from the BluRay release info:

didn't know they did a blueray release.

sweet.  always like this series till the screwed it up in the 5th and then lost direction in the 6th season.

thanks for the upload, guess i'll have to show some patience  =)
